💙4G Dual SIM & 3 Card Slots💙Blackview A55 smartphone adopts 2+1 card slot design, supports two 4g SIM cards, you can use the second number without carrying an extra mobile phone. manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Blackview Attitude - Strength produces Value. Breakthrough creates the Future! Blackview We focus on high technology and high performance.Blackview Smartphone will appeal to you with its powerful features and efficiency! Blackview A55 Cell Phone Outstanding Features - Powerful, Fast, Elegant 0.358in, 0.43lb Body: Light as a feather. The matte textured back cover and ergonomically rounded curves provide a comfortable feel.400 nit 6.528" HD+ IPS Display: Stunning views on the big screen, help you explore every details!2.0GHz Quad-core MediaTek MT6761V CPU: Run multiple applications and multitask with enough fluidity, responsiveness and efficiency to meet your productivity and entertainment needs.Android 11 & Doke OS 2.1 System: More respect for user privacy and more humanized design.4780mAh & Smart AI Battery Management: Slow down the loss of power and last a whole day.8MP Clear Triple Rear Cameras + Multiple Shooting Modes (time-lapse, professional): Record your wonderful life, and clearly record the beauty of every day with you.4G Dual SIM Slots: Deliver fast and stable mobile network experience for better work and play capabilities.Triple Navigation System: GPS + GLONASS + BeidouSupport: G-sensor + P-sensor + L-sensorConnectivity: 2G / 3G / 4G, 5G Wifi, Bluetooth 4.2 You can use whichever carrier you want after setting the APN and it is easy to set. If you encounter any quality, hardware, network or operation problems while using your Blackview A55 android phone, please let us know immediately.

Exquisite Appearance Inspired by the water ripple resulting from raindrops dripping into the calm lake, made of durable material and treated with refined craftsmanship, A55 cellphone presents a minimalist back cover in youthful and living colors. With the texture of matte finish and ergonomic rounded curves, it’s comfortable to fit in hand. Clear and Large Screen 6.528" Waterdrop Display: Start your next incredibly immersive visual journey with silky smoothness and fast responsiveness.720*1600 HD+ Resolution: Bring you a vivid experience of the real world that will captivate you, providing vivid details, rich colors and sharp contrasts.400nit Brightness: Clearly read mobile phone content even in sunlight.

Blackview A55 unlocked phones is equipped with MT6761V quad-core processor clocked up to 2.0GHz and 3 GB RAM, ensuring more stable performance every time you process multiple tasks at the same time, you can run more applications at the same time, no longer limit work and games .A55 mobile phone also supports 128GB expansion memory. With the help of SD card to expand the phone space, you can store and download photos, videos, e-books, games, etc. at any time, making your life more interesting and no longer worry about storage limitations.With a powerful processor and larger storage space, the A55 smartphone does its best to let every user say goodbye to problems such as delays during use, bringing a smoother and more amazing experience to every user.

Android 11 - Comprehensively upgrade user privacy protection, communication is more convenient Doke OS 2.1 - Intelligent control, human interaction experience System Manager: Support all-in-one controls such as trash cleaning and battery management.Clone Phone: Transfer the privacy data safely from the old to the new device.Artistic Themes: Two sets of themes are with enriching icons and invigorating wallpapers.Cold Room: Freeze apps to avoid their stealthy background running and save memory.Screenshot/Long Screenshot: For important messages, make a screenshot or long screenshot and edit it easily.Dual-window Entertainment: View different contents on the same screen to enable entertaining while working.

As an affordable basic phone for everyone, Blackview A55 unlocked phone is equipped with an 8MP rear triple camera that supports multiple shooting modes such as time-lapse, and professional.5MP front camera, perfect selfie camera, make your photos more eye-catching. Feel free to use the A55 smart phone to take selfies, shoot creative videos, and leave more wonderful moments in your life!

A55 cell phone dual sim has a large 4780mAh battery and intelligent dual protection functions, which can meet your long standby needs. AI smart battery management can close idle applications in time to help save power. A55 telephone cellulaire is your best choice!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: works great. I love the phone

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very little space
reviews.reviewText: I love the price and the software that blackview uses, as far as blocking and ringtone/ notification settings fo individual contacts and apps. However the operation storage for this phone is minimal! I am only able to download and use 2 additional apps (not factory apps). Sometimes I can only use one additional app.However regardless of that, I have to clean storage and delete things multiple times a day. Or else the phone won't operate properly. Now I will say maybe that is due to the fact that this phone is a 2021 phone and we are now in the year 2023 so data is more than it was back then as it continues to get more as the years progress. Even with an SD card installed the phone itself has limited operational memory it can use I have disabled apps and uninstalled updates on apps just to be able to keep using this phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Bad seller/ phone
reviews.reviewText: The seller advertised the phone as unlocked, meanwhile it’s locked to an identified carrier. The phone can’t connect to the internet. I bought several of the phones for my relatives in Africa but none of them, 3 in number could connect to the internet via any local carrier. Bad seller and bad phone. Please don’t buy this phone again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cell Phone A55 Not Compatible With Boost Mobile
reviews.reviewText: A55 not a bad phone, however was not compatible with Boost Mobile. I lost my phone and decided to buy the A55, only to find out it's not compatible with Boost Mobile and had to return it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great phone for the price ,it's only 4g but still works for another year , nice phone

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I will try a new one
reviews.reviewText: Surfing thru apps and websites time response is somewhat slow , just good to play music

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not great quality
reviews.reviewText: This phone not good quality but good for a replacement until you can afford a better phone.

Uno smartphone economico che ha un ottimo rapporto qualità-prezzo. Android aggiornato all'ultima versione disponibile, ottima estetica, nessun problema funzionale dopo 6 mesi. Dato il prezzo e la buona qualità, lo trovo assolutamente simile a modelli molto più costosi. Unico neo: la fotocamera non di altissimo livello (ma per il prezzo che ha, a me va benissimo così).

reviews.reviewTitle: Bonne prise en main et Bon modèle pour un téléphone portable pas cher
reviews.reviewText: Portable pris pour ma femme et le rendu est Top, stockage efficace. Même niveau jeu en performance rien à dire. Livré proprement. Bonne photo. J'ai aimé le téléphone en lui même pour sa bonne prise en main et surpris ni lourd ni léger et le rendu est cool pour ma part !!!

Ottimo prodotto. Buona fattura. Buone prestazioni e velocità di navigazione. Un entry-level che in realtà regge il confronto con prodotti di altri Brand di fascia ben superiore. Ottimo rapporto qualità/prezzo. Ottimo acquisto.

reviews.reviewTitle: Buen diseño, por ese precio no se puede pedir mas
reviews.reviewText: La calidad precio, está muy bien.

Den Kidis gefällt es, bei der AF Funktion der Kamera die Einstellmöglichkeiten nutzen dann geht das auch wirklich gut (bei Tag auch ohne).Keine schnelle Knipsi Knipsi Kamera, aber eben wie früher (Nacht = Nachtmodus etc.) und dann zu analog doch erstaunlich gut.Das Paket stimmt für den B-Warenpreis.DANKE
